options: A markup language for structuring content
questions.answer: A markup language for structuring content

questions.ques: What is JavaScript primarily used for?
Which of the following is used to define a class in CSS?
What is the purpose of the 'alt' attribute in an tag?
options: To define the width of the image
To add a caption to the image
To provide alternative text for the image
To add a border around the image
questions.answer: To provide alternative text for the image

options: Data passed from parent to child components
Local data storage within a component
questions.answer: Local data storage within a component

questions.ques: Which of these is used to declare a variable that cannot be reassigned in JavaScript?

options: A JavaScript extension for defining styles
A syntax extension for writing HTML in JavaScript
A new type of JavaScript function
questions.answer: A syntax extension for writing HTML in JavaScript

questions.ques: Which CSS property is used to change the text color?
What does the '===' operator do in JavaScript?
options: Compares values and performs type conversion
Compares both value and type without type conversion
Assigns a value to a variable
questions.answer: Compares both value and type without type conversion
